body:
Don't call out and say, "OH MY GAWD ITS **! HES A YOUTUBER I LOVE YOU!!!!" 
dont even spam that.
dont make him/her feel weird, alienated, unwanted, or bad.
Play the game normally, not jumping around spamming blocks.
^^actually applies to all players^^

I made this thread to show everyone after a guy ahem*painostar*ahem started doing these things. It makes us feel embraassed and horrible. Just dont do that.


ps: plz help me add stuff that we should not do toward youtubers and players generally.

title: If a youtuber joins the game

replies.body: I agree with the part were they shouldn't change how they play. But I am fine talking to people who notice me and say hi.

replies.body:
I don't know, this applies for some people, but for me it's okay.

I usually have people saying "Hey MLGPorky I know you from YouTube" or something like that, but it's fine with me, I just respond back!

Anyways, this may be the case for some people, but with others it's completely normal. :)

Good point, I've seen SOOO many videos of servers with approximately the same amount of people as Avicus go berserk when a YouTuber comes on.. if anything imma try to kill them to make them really work for their experience >:D
hahaha i dunno, but i agree nevertheless :)
+1
